summary:
This mod add some standalone followers that belong to Storm Cloak.
They are my dovakin and my followers.
I'm glad if they can be shared with your world.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add some standalone followers that belong to Storm Cloak. 
They are my dovakin and my followers.
I'm glad if they can be shared with your world. 

Followers find in the Palace of the Windhelm Kings.
Natalie,Gol,Gikuri,Niga------Windhelm Barracks
Rina------Palace of the Kings Upstairs (Wuunferth the Unliving's room) 
Sorry,I'm not good at English.
